title: Ivanti security advisory (AV26-068)
description: On January 29, 2026, Ivanti published a security advisory to address critical vulnerabilities in the following product:
products: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile  version 12.5.0.0 and prior, 12.6.0.0 and prior, 12.7.0.0 and prior, version 12.5.1.0 and prior and 12.6.1.0 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
